Class Patient

java.lang.Object
model.User
model.Patient
public class Patient extends User
The Patient class represents a patient in the hospital management system. It extends the User class and includes specific attributes and methods for patients, such as managing their medical records.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private MedicalRecord
    medicalRecord
    The medical record associated with this patient.

  • Field Details

    • medicalRecord

      private MedicalRecord medicalRecord
      The medical record associated with this patient.

  • Constructor Details

    • Patient

      public Patient(String id, String name, String dateOfBirth, String gender, String bloodType, String contactInfo, int newUser, String password, int contactNumber)
      Constructs a Patient instance with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the patient.
      name - The name of the patient.
      dateOfBirth - The date of birth of the patient.
      gender - The gender of the patient.
      bloodType - The blood type of the patient.
      contactInfo - The contact information of the patient.
      newUser - Indicates if the patient is a new user (1 for yes, 0 for no).
      password - The password for the patient account.
      contactNumber - The contact number of the patient.

  • Method Details

    • viewMedicalRecord

      public void viewMedicalRecord()
      Displays the medical record for this patient. If no medical record is found, a message is displayed indicating this.

    • setMedicalRecord

      public void setMedicalRecord(MedicalRecord medicalRecord)
      Sets the medical record for this patient.
      Parameters:
      medicalRecord - The MedicalRecord object to associate with this patient.

    • getMedicalRecord

      public MedicalRecord getMedicalRecord()
      Gets the medical record associated with this patient.
      Returns:
      The medical record of the patient.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the patient, including their details.
      Overrides:
      toString in class User
      Returns:
      A string containing the patient's ID, name, date of birth, gender, blood type, contact information, contact number, and whether they are a new user.
